entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
